name: indian_railway_search
description: Search Indian Railway trains by either train number or it's name.

search.description: Either train number or it's name.

api_key.description: X-RapidAPI-Key, which is the api key for using Rapid API.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
